org.nise.ux.asl.face

Interface ClientInfoProfilerFactory<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of <Data> being listened on <listening port>

    public interface ClientInfoProfilerFactory<D>
    Interface used to create ClientInfoProfiler instances.
    Because Managed Servicing System needs to create and destroy serving threads dynamically you're required to implement your own factory to let system produce instances of ClientInfoProfiler<D> at runtime.
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientInfoProfiler<D> getClientInfoProfiler()
      Create a new instance of ClientInfoProfiler<D>

    • Method Detail

      • getClientInfoProfiler

        ClientInfoProfiler<D> getClientInfoProfiler()
        Create a new instance of ClientInfoProfiler<D>
        Returns:
        a new client profiler object
